visual_enhancers.noise_texture: opacity-[0.03] mix-blend-multiply pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-medium hover:shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-primary/20 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-medium hover:bg-primary/5 transition-all

cards.feature: bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all group

inputs.default: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

media.treatment: Images must have rounded-3xl corners and soft shadows. Use parallax effects where possible.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME OVERHAUL: Completely remove the dark theme. Set 'darkMode' to 'class' in tailwind.config.js but default to light mode styles in index.css. Background must be white (#FFFFFF).
2. TYPOGRAPHY: Replace 'Syne' with 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings. Use 'Manrope' for body text. Ensure headings are MASSIVE (text-6xl+).
3. LAYOUT: Do not use symmetric grids. Use the 'Bento' grid strategy. Create overlapping elements using negative margins (e.g., -mt-12).
4. NAVIGATION: Create a floating glass navbar (sticky top-4 mx-auto max-w-2xl rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-md).
5. FOOTER: Massive footer with 'text-[12vw]' brand name 'CLARITY' at the bottom.
6. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Every button and card must have a hover state (lift + shadow). Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations.
7. CONTENT: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
8. SHADCN: Customize all Shadcn components to match the new rounded/light aesthetic. Remove sharp corners.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Dark colors only for text and high-contrast accents.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
